manifest.name: @jimp/js-png
manifest.readme:
@jimp/png

Default Jimp png encoder/decoder.

## Available Methods ### Jimp.deflateLevel Sets the deflate level used when saving as PNG format (default is 9) ### Jimp.deflateStrategy Sets the deflate strategy used when saving as PNG format (default is 3) ### Jimp.filterType Sets the filter type used when saving as PNG format (default is automatic filters) ### Jimp.colorType Sets the color type used when saving as PNG format (one of 0, 2, 4, 6) ### Filter Types ```js Jimp.PNG_FILTER_AUTO; Jimp.PNG_FILTER_NONE; Jimp.PNG_FILTER_SUB; Jimp.PNG_FILTER_UP; Jimp.PNG_FILTER_AVERAGE; Jimp.PNG_FILTER_PATH; ```
